vulnerabilities.title: @nubosoftware/node-static failure to catch exception can result in server crash
vulnerabilities.description: This affects all versions of the package node-static; all versions of the package @nubosoftware/node-static. The package fails to catch an exception when user input includes null bytes. This allows attackers to access http://host/%00 and crash the server.

vulnerabilities.title: node-static and @nubosoftware/node-static vulnerable to Directory Traversal
vulnerabilities.description: node-static and its fork, @nubosoftware/node-static, are vulnerable to Directory Traversal due to improper file path sanitization in the startsWith() method in the servePath function.
